title-part.text: TOOLS FOR GRINDING, BUFFING, OR SHARPENING

reference.text: tools for grinding or polishing optical surfaces on lenses or surfaces of similar shape B24B13/01; grinding heads B24B41/00; manufacture of abrasive or friction articles or shaped materials containing macromolecular substances C08J5/14; polishing compositions C09G1/00; abrasives C09K3/14

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers grinding tools for working on any material
Tools for grinding, buffing or sharpening, specially designed for a particular purpose, which purpose is provided for in a single other place, are classified in that place, e.g. B23F21/02

title-part.text: Physical features of abrasive bodies, or sheets, e.g. abrasive surfaces of special nature
Abrasive bodies or sheets characterised by their constituents

CPC-specific-text.text: the constituent being used as supporting member
Flexible supporting members, e.g. paper, woven, plastic materials
with special coatings
the constituent being used during pre- or after-treatment
the constituent being used as bonding agent between different parts of an abrasive tool
Abrasive bodies without external bonding agent

title-part.text: the constituent being used as bonding agent

CPC-specific-text.text: or mixture of metals with ceramic materials, e.g. hard metals, "cermets", cements

title-part.text: for close-grained structure, e.g. using metal with low melting point
for porous or cellular structure, e.g. for use with diamonds as abrasives
for close-grained structure, i.e. of high density

CPC-specific-text.text: synthetic or natural
or natural or synthetic macromolecular compounds
Reaction products obtained from aldehydes or ketones

title-part.text: characterised by additives enhancing special physical properties, e.g. wear resistance, electric conductivity, self-cleaning properties

CPC-specific-text.text: incorporated in the bonding agent
the bonding agent being organic
utilised during polishing, or grinding operation
utilised as impregnating agent for porous abrasive bodies

title-part.text: Bonded abrasive wheels, or wheels with inserted abrasive blocks, designed for acting only by their periphery
with inserted abrasive blocks, e.g. segmental

CPC-specific-text.text: with segments embedded in a matrix which is rubbed away during the grinding process
with segments mounted axially one against the other

title-part.text: with cooling provisions, e.g. with radial slots

CPC-specific-text.text: having different cutting segments
having an internal cutting edge
Balancing means

title-part.text: Bonded abrasive wheels, or wheels with inserted abrasive blocks, designed for acting otherwise than only by their periphery, e.g. by the front face

CPC-specific-text.text: for cutting spherical surfaces

title-part.text: with inserted abrasive blocks, e.g. segmental

CPC-specific-text.text: with segments embedded in a matrix which is rubbed away during the grinding process
Grinding blocks; their mountings or supports

title-part.text: with apertures for inspecting the surface to be abraded

reference.text: if specially designed for a particular purpose provided for in a single other class, that class takes precedence;

CPC-specific-text.text: saw cylinders having their cutting rim equipped with abrasive particles for working stone or glass B28D1/041

title-part.text: Wheels or drums supporting in exchangeable arrangement a layer of flexible abrasive material, e.g. sandpaper

reference.text: wheels or drums as machine elements F16

CPC-specific-text.text: Wheels having flaps of flexible abrasive material supported by a flexible material
Tools consisting of a rolled strip of flexible material

title-part.text: Expansible drums for carrying flexible material in tubular form, e.g. expanded by centrifugal force
Rigid drums for carrying flexible material
able to be stripped-off from a built-in delivery spool
Circular back-plates for carrying flexible material

CPC-specific-text.text: Devices for mounting sheets on a backing plate

title-part.text: with suction means for securing the material
Constructional features of flexible abrasive materials
Special features in the manufacture of such materials

CPC-specific-text.text: Manufacture of flexible abrasive materials
without embedded abrasive particles
Making abrasive webs
without embedded abrasive particles
Finishing manufactured abrasive sheets, e.g. cutting, deforming

title-part.text: Backings, e.g. foils, webs, mesh fabrics
Connecting the ends of materials, e.g. for making abrasive belts

CPC-specific-text.text: Treatment of the ends of flexible abrasive materials before connecting them

title-part.text: Equipment for after-treatment of the coated backings, e.g. for flexing the coating
Wheels having flexibly-acting working parts, e.g. buffing wheels
comprising a plurality of flaps or strips arranged around the axis

CPC-specific-text.text: comprising flaps not covering the entire periphery of the wheel

title-part.text: the flaps or strips being individually attached
comprising annular or circular sheets packed side by side

CPC-specific-text.text: comprising flaps with a circular sheet on each side

title-part.text: comprising assemblies of felted or spongy material, e.g. felt, steel wool, foamed latex

CPC-specific-text.text: Wheels of special form
having a brush-like working surface
comprising assemblies of felted or spongy material; comprising pads surrounded by a flexible material

title-part.text: Hand tools or other devices for non-rotary grinding, polishing, or stropping

CPC-specific-text.text: using in exchangeable arrangement a layer of flexible material
able to be stripped-off from a built-in delivery spool
Glove-shaped abrasive devices

title-part.text: specially designed for sharpening cutting edges

CPC-specific-text.text: for electric shaving blades
for grinding shears, scissors
for sharpening both knives and scissors
for sharpening skate blades, i.e. blades having two sharp edges defined by three surfaces intersecting in pairs at an angle of substantially 90°
for sharpening ski edges, i.e. sharp edges defined by two surfaces intersecting at an angle of substantially 90°
with sharpening elements in interengaging or in mutual contact
the elements being rotatable
the sharpening elements being fitted to knife sheaths, holders or handles
with reciprocating whetstones
having a crank handle
with whetting leather
Holders therefor
or other grinding devices

title-part.text: , e.g. wheels, not otherwise provided for

CPC-specific-text.text: using moulds or presses
by electrolytic deposition
by impregnation
by winding up abrasive bands
by stacking sheets of abrasive material
by impressing abrasive powder in a matrix
by extrusion
using adhesives for bonding abrasive particles or grinding elements to a support, e.g. by gluing
of wire-reinforced grinding tools
Tools not otherwise provided for

title-part.text: Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass

CPC-specific-text.text: Segments of abrasive wheels

title-part.text: Bushings or mountings integral with the grinding wheel
Tool surfaces formed with a pattern
Grinding tools with incorporated marking device
